tutorial_steps.Message: Augmentations in MirageXR are primitives that comprise the holographic part of the training experience of the user. A trainer can use different types of augmentations to construct the holographic experience, while the trainee perceives them as part of the learning experience.
Look down to your feet and you will see an aura surrounding you, with connecting lines leading to where the action happens.

selection_text: How to add step title and description

tutorial_steps.Message: You can add or change the title and description of any step, just switch to the info tab.

selection_text: How to add augmentations to a step

tutorial_steps.Message: You can add augmentations by pressing the plus button here.

selection_text: How to make changes to existing augmentations

tutorial_steps.Message: Additional options for added augmentations can be accessed by pressing the three dots on the right side of an augmentation tile.

selection_text: Is there a way for an augmentation to stay for more than one step

tutorial_steps.Message: You can make the same augmentation to be present in multiple steps. Tap on the settings of the augmentation (three dots on the right), choose keep-alive, and select the range of steps.
